sense.def:
Kadar je ena stvar
unlike another thing
, imata dve stvari različne lastnosti.

seg.quote: Rodin was unlike his predecessor in every way.

sense.def:
Z besedo
unlike
primerjamo dve osebi, stvari ali položaja in pokažemo, kako različna sta.

seg.quote: Mrs Hochstadt, unlike Etta, was a careful shopper.

sense.def:
Kar je
unlike someone
, ni značilno za osebo, ki je tisto naredila.

cit.quote: ne nekomu podobno, neznačilno za nekoga

seg.quote: It was unlike her to mention it.
